name: Speed Heroes
description:
SPEED HERO - Addictive, Simple and Hard, Fun , fantastic feeling
SPEED HERO is the endless running genre game . The concept of an endless runner is simple. You run until you die
-It's all about the running and jumping.
-It's a nice palate cleanser after the visual spectacle represented in the other games.
- Endless runners are a fairly simple class of game to begin with
- The gameplay is nothing different from all the other typical endless running games mentioned, but
- The graphics give you a retro feeling . Fantastic feeling !
- In the game you have to go through the stages of an extremely easy and extremely difficult, and the difficulty will increase over time
- Running and jumping quickly to get many score
- You must eat many star to good score

SPEED HERO has these features:
- Classic retro look and fantastic feel
- The graphics are realistic and the sound effects are hair-raising
- Nice graphics and real sound
- Hard play game
- Can choose one of the two heroes to play the game
- Blue Hero and Green Hero
- Difficult to get good score
- Gain your high score by eat many star
- Addictive, Simple, Fun
